title: Giving Thanks! Part 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Alright, then, as µ’s representative I—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hold on, if there’ll be anyone giving a speech, it should be me. Let’s see, this past year, µ’s has—<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Cheers~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Huh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Wait for me to finish!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Since it’s just the nine of us here, there’s no need for such formality.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That’s true.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>But formalities are important......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, that’s right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka-chan! This cream puff is so delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What!? Which one? Nom... Yum~! This is great~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Hey Honoka, you have cream on your lips......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Guh, they got Honoka too...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Here, Nico, have some too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Maki, Hanayo, don’t you want to hear my speech!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Here, open wide.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>......Hey, this red bean daifuku mochi is delicious! I’ll have another!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
